title: ATP World Tour Masters 1000 / WTA Premier, Madrid Masters Women's Singles Seeds Progress
text: May 8, 2018 / 10:13 PM / in an hour UPDATE 2-ATP World Tour Masters 1000 / WTA Premier, Madrid Masters Women's Singles Seeds Progress Reuters Staff 3 Min Read May 9 (OPTA) - Seeds Progress from the ATP World Tour Masters 1000 / WTA Premier, Madrid Masters Women's Singles matches on Tuesday .. Seeds .. Seed Round Rslt Opponent Score 1 Simona Halep (ROU) 3rd to play Kristyna Pliskova (CZE) (start 10:00) 2nd won Elise Mertens (BEL) 6-0 6-3 1st won Ekaterina Makarova (RUS) 6-1 6-0 2 Caroline Wozniacki (DEN) 3rd to play Kiki Bertens (NED) (start 12:00) 2nd won Ashleigh Barty (AUS) 6-2 4-6 6-4 1st won Daria Gavrilova (AUS) 6-3 6-1 3 Garbine Muguruza (ESP) 3rd to play 14-Daria Kasatkina (RUS) (start 18:00) 2nd won Donna Vekic (CRO) 2-6 6-4 6-1 1st won Shuai Peng (CHN) 6-4 6-2 4 Elina Svitolina (UKR) 2nd lost Carla Suarez Navarro (ESP) 2-6 7-6(3) 6-4 1st won Alize Cornet (FRA) 6-2 6-2 5 Jelena Ostapenko (LAT) 1st lost Irina-Camelia Begu (ROU) 6-3 6-3 6 Karolina Pliskova (CZE) 3rd to play 9-Sloane Stephens (USA) (start 12:00) 2nd won Victoria Azarenka (BLR) 6-2 1-6 7-5 1st won Elena Vesnina (RUS) 6-4 6-2 7 Caroline Garcia (FRA) 3rd to play 11-Julia Goerges (GER) (start 12:00) 2nd won Petra Martic (CRO) 6-3 7-5 1st won Dominika Cibulkova (SVK) 6-1 7-5 8 Venus Williams (USA) 1st lost Anett Kontaveit (EST) 3-6 6-3 6-2 9 Sloane Stephens (USA) 3rd to play 6-Karolina Pliskova (CZE) (start 12:00) 2nd won Samantha Stosur (AUS) 6-1 6-3 1st won Silvia Soler Espinosa (ESP) 6-3 6-2 10 Petra Kvitova (CZE) 3rd to play Anett Kontaveit (EST) (start 14:00) 2nd won Monica Puig (PUR) 6-3 7-6(8) 1st won Lesia Tsurenko (UKR) 6-1 6-2 11 Julia Goerges (GER) 3rd to play 7-Caroline Garcia (FRA) (start 12:00) 2nd won Lara Arruabarrena (ESP) 2-6 6-4 6-2 1st won Timea Babos (HUN) 6-2 6-4 12 Coco Vandeweghe (USA) 1st lost Kristina Mladenovic (FRA) 7-5 6-0 13 Madison Keys (USA) 1st lost Sara Sorribes Tormo (ESP) 7-5 6-2 14 Daria Kasatkina (RUS) 3rd to play 3-Garbine Muguruza (ESP) (start 18:00) 2nd won Sorana Cirstea (ROU) 6-3 6-1 1st won Qiang Wang (CHN) 7-5 7-6(6) 15 Anastasija Sevastova (LAT) 2nd lost Kiki Bertens (NED) 6-1 6-4 1st won Anna Schmiedlova (SVK) 6-3 4-6 6-3 16 Magdalena Rybarikova (SVK) 1st lost Johanna Konta (GBR) 6-3 7-5 (Note : all times are GMT)
